comment.author: 11865422@N08
comment._content: from the above view on the flicker hybrid map it looks like deep water terminal along the james river past pocohontas parkway... same 3 rounded roof system and in a diagonal a little bit, but one new building to the right of these two.

comment.author: 15033864@N07
comment._content: This was the site of the Town of Warwick. A major port and Recreation area years ago.

comment.author: 73626679@N03
comment._content: That's most definitely "Deepwater Terminal",you can see the cranes used too unload ships.My father used to tell me the "Richmond City Jail" was also located on this site!
